posts.name: Ren
posts.cooked:
I attempted to go through the installation instructions found on the contribution readme page here.

Looks like the dependency “mac-screen-share” uses the type “SCContentSharingPickerObserver”, which is only available in OSX 14 and above.

Is anyone able to contribute on a intel Monterrey mac?

Below is the output of my cli when building:

odules/node-gyp/bin/node-gyp.js rebuild
gyp info it worked if it ends with ok
gyp info using node-gyp@11.1.0
gyp info using node@22.15.0 | darwin | x64
gyp info find Python using Python version 3.12.4 found at "/usr/local/Caskroom/miniconda/base/bin/python3"

gyp info spawn /usr/local/Caskroom/miniconda/base/bin/python3
gyp info spawn args [
gyp info spawn args '/Users/ren/Library/pnpm/.tools/pnpm/10.6.4/node_modules/pnpm/dist/node_modules/node-gyp/gyp/gyp_main.py',
gyp info spawn args 'binding.gyp',
gyp info spawn args '-f',
gyp info spawn args 'make',
gyp info spawn args '-I',
gyp info spawn args '/Users/ren/Development/Signal-Desktop/node_modules/.pnpm/@indutny+mac-screen-share@1.0.13/node_modules/@indutny/mac-screen-share/build/config.gypi',
gyp info spawn args '-I',
gyp info spawn args '/Users/ren/Library/pnpm/.tools/pnpm/10.6.4/node_modules/pnpm/dist/node_modules/node-gyp/addon.gypi',
gyp info spawn args '-I',
gyp info spawn args '/Users/ren/Library/Caches/node-gyp/22.15.0/include/node/common.gypi',
gyp info spawn args '-Dlibrary=shared_library',
gyp info spawn args '-Dvisibility=default',
gyp info spawn args '-Dnode_root_dir=/Users/ren/Library/Caches/node-gyp/22.15.0',
gyp info spawn args '-Dnode_gyp_dir=/Users/ren/Library/pnpm/.tools/pnpm/10.6.4/node_modules/pnpm/dist/node_modules/node-gyp',
gyp info spawn args '-Dnode_lib_file=/Users/ren/Library/Caches/node-gyp/22.15.0/<(target_arch)/node.lib',
gyp info spawn args '-Dmodule_root_dir=/Users/ren/Development/Signal-Desktop/node_modules/.pnpm/@indutny+mac-screen-share@1.0.13/node_modules/@indutny/mac-screen-share',
gyp info spawn args '-Dnode_engine=v8',
gyp info spawn args '--depth=.',
gyp info spawn args '--no-parallel',
gyp info spawn args '--generator-output',
gyp info spawn args 'build',
gyp info spawn args '-Goutput_dir=.'
gyp info spawn args ]
gyp info spawn make
gyp info spawn args [ 'BUILDTYPE=Release', '-C', 'build' ]
  TOUCH Release/obj.target/../../../../node-addon-api@8.3.0/node_modules/node-addon-api/node_addon_api.stamp
  CXX(target) Release/obj.target/mac-screen-share/addon.o
../addon.mm:41:39: error: no type or protocol named 'SCContentSharingPickerObserver'
@interface StreamDelegate : NSObject <SCContentSharingPickerObserver,
                                      ^
../addon.mm:264:31: error: expected a type
- (void)contentSharingPicker:(SCContentSharingPicker*)picker
                              ^
../addon.mm:329:31: error: expected a type
- (void)contentSharingPicker:(SCContentSharingPicker*)picker
                              ^
../addon.mm:98:20: error: use of undeclared identifier 'SCContentSharingPicker'
    auto* picker = SCContentSharingPicker.sharedPicker;
                   ^
../addon.mm:115:18: error: use of undeclared identifier 'SCContentSharingPicker'
  auto* picker = SCContentSharingPicker.sharedPicker;
                 ^
../addon.mm:184:20: error: use of undeclared identifier 'SCContentSharingPicker'
    auto* picker = SCContentSharingPicker.sharedPicker;
                   ^
../addon.mm:306:59: warning: incompatible pointer types sending 'StreamDelegate *' to parameter of type 'id<SCStreamDelegate> _Nullable' [-Wincompatible-pointer-types]
                                                 delegate:self];
                                                          ^~~~
../addon.mm:309:40: warning: incompatible pointer types sending 'StreamDelegate *' to parameter of type 'id<SCStreamOutput> _Nonnull' [-Wincompatible-pointer-types]
  BOOL r = [new_stream addStreamOutput:self
                                       ^~~~
2 warnings and 6 errors generated.
make: *** [Release/obj.target/mac-screen-share/addon.o] Error 1
gyp ERR! build error
gyp ERR! stack Error: `make` failed with exit code: 2
gyp ERR! stack at ChildProcess.<anonymous> (/Users/ren/Library/pnpm/.tools/pnpm/10.6.4/node_modules/pnpm/dist/node_modules/node-gyp/lib/build.js:216:23)
gyp ERR! System Darwin 21.6.0
gyp ERR! command "/Users/ren/.nvm/versions/node/v22.15.0/bin/node" "/Users/ren/Library/pnpm/.tools/pnpm/10.6.4/node_modules/pnpm/dist/node_modules/node-gyp/bin/node-gyp.js" "rebuild"
gyp ERR! cwd /Users/ren/Development/Signal-Desktop/node_modules/.pnpm/@indutny+mac-screen-share@1.0.13/node_modules/@indutny/mac-screen-share
gyp ERR! node -v v22.15.0
gyp ERR! node-gyp -v v11.1.0
gyp ERR! not ok
